Plot: Tiina decides to reconnect with his aged and bohemian father living alone. With her reluctant daughter and new husband, they move in and start to renovate the old house. However, neither the renovation nor facing the past is effortless.
Title: Homecoming
Writer: Petri Karra (novel), Mika Kaurismäki, Sami Keski-Vähälä
Actors: Vesa-Matti Loiri, Armi Toivanen, Peter Franzén, Jani Volanen
